remarks: One half of ~ tgptsmscls , true in any commutative monoid topological space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tsmscls.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
tsmscls.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) $.
tsmscls.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
tsmscls.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. TopSp ) $.
tsmscls.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
tsmscls.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
tsmscls.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( G tsums F ) ) $.
tsmscls $p |- ( ph -> ( ( cls ` J ) ` { X } ) C_ ( G tsums F ) ) $.
